string-array.name: createTableSql
string-array.item: create table paper_nav(id integer primary key autoincrement, json varchar null)

string-array.name: updateTableSql
string-array.item: alter table paper_menu rename to temp_paper_menu;
create table paper_nav(id integer primary key autoincrement, json varchar null);
insert into paper_nav select id, json from temp_paper_menu;
